They are no better than Hanes' similar product, and with Hanes you can get 7 pairs for $15 -- a MUCH better value for a very similar product.

I specify entirely bc it can appear the bottom is a different texture, its not, just different color. It does NOT smell like some of lesser quality bags can, when made of man made material.(tag doesn't specify the actual material, just says man made). Its a dark silver, not too shiny, which makes it a great match for wearing it with LOTS of colors. The metal attachments are all silver as well. I wear a lot of silver jewelry, so it matches my metal too :)  Zipper works good. Bag strap is a tad long for me, however it offers a few notches to move up some, but being 5.2 and wanting it even shorter, I ended up stopping by the boot shop and tipped the guy $5 to punch a few more holes in the strap for me. Inside is a tan lining and a generous zipper compartment, where I put my small wallet. It's a great bag to go between work and play, also to travel with as the size fits perfect in my backpack, while going through the airport hoopla. When I get to my destination, I can just pull the purse out and go, leaving the backpack behind with the things I don't need.

I also read the difference between American & Chinese sizes--I typically wear a small (5'3" 114lbs), so I ordered a LARGE and it fits perfectly! It is loose-fitting on top, but that is also described, so I think the t-shirt is exactly as it is marketed. So my advice is simply to know the product you are buying & read the information correctly. I am satisfied with my purchase!

reviewText: Very flattering. Stood up so well I bought it in a second color

I saw the display picture--a *realistic* crow in *three* poses--and that's really what prompted me to get this.  I'm fascinated by crows, and thought it would look cool in my office.  I was hoping to be able to move its wings and maybe its beak and feet; but no.  What I got was a styrofoam body, pins for eyes, feathers pretty well glued on, and immobile wings just sort of glued to the side, with a plastic immobile beak and feet.  It just sits there, looking faker than something I could've made myself with a sock and black spray paint.  It's not "realistic" at all.  I think perhaps you should let the buyers know that.  You could say "hand-made semi-realistic corvid-like model," and let them decide.  And, actually, I still might've bought it.  It just wasn't what I thought I was getting.  (I was also kept waiting for this item--it didn't arrive until one day after the final delivery date listed, and I was really excited to see it had finally come.  And then I opened it...)  Good effort.  It's cute.
summary: The picture is a little deceptive

reviewText: First, these aren't very warm. Second, the sole inserts come up when I take them off. For brand-new (and not cheap!) boots, that's not great. In terms of comfort they're fine. Nothing special but nothing to complain about either.

The image on this wallet has absolutely nothing, NOTHING, to do with Cthulhu, and this thing needs to stop appearing in every Lovecraft related search I do on this website. It's an octopus; Cthulhu's head has tentacles coming out of the lower, front bit of his head. There's nothing even remotely occultic about the wallet, either. I'll grant "Evil" because, ooooooh, it has black eyes. So wicked. Whatever. Cthulhu also has rudimentary, bat-like wings. Should we label a bat-themed wallet as Cthulhu Bat Call of Evil Lovecraft Occult Wallet? I think not.

One star review until such time as the product name is changed.

This wallet looks great and I'm happy with my purchase, but for the first few weeks of having it I had the toughest time sliding cards in and out of this wallet.

I guess it just needed to be broken in first, but for someone who uses his debit card more than cash, this was a real pain in the ass.

The bottom (the bit you actually touch with the base of your foot) has some kind of stuffing underneath it that makes them very snug but very uncomfortable. I do not recommend purchasing this shoe; other, better ones cost all of $2-3 more.

reviewText: Wife is using these for Japanese Taiko drum practice.  Loves them.  Now we're looking for the same thing with a rubber sole but cannot find the right women's size to order.

Our whole family loves these shoes! Mother-in-law got us all a pair for Christmas a few years back and we wore them into the ground. This Christmas we returned the favor and got some for her, she was ecstatic! They are so comfortable and you can do anything in them. They fit perfectly order your shoe size. And they were delivered exactly when they said they would be!

I've worn these shoes for years now. They are NOT for outdoor wear - unless it's a really dry day! Enough water to saturate the sole and the shoe becomes stiff and (in my opinion) unwearable. But that is NOT a flaw in the shoe!

They are narrow, but being 100% cotton they will stretch to fit your foot - give it a few days (3, maybe?) and they slip on with comfort. I also have a spot on the left foot where (on every pair!) my baby toe wears through the top of the shoe. So, I suppose these things do have a bit of eccentricity, but again, this is not a flaw, just the way of 100% cotton shoes!

Depending on how much I wear them (most of every day for me!) they will last at least 3 or 4 months (if I wear them till they drop off my feet I can get 6 months or more, but people begin to make comments...). Now that may not sound like a lot, but back when I only used a pair for Tai Chi (a long time ago!), they lasted more than a year. And for the price that's not bad at all!

And remember: These work as a wonderful everyday slipper (I even wear them to the grocery on occasion...) as well as a Tai Chi shoe.

Just stay out of the rain.

I've been wearing "Chinese slippers" ever since I discovered them in the small stalls lining Manhattan's Canal Street. But once I left New York it was impossible to find them. I'll be ordering several more to stock up. Thank you, Amazon! Without you I wouldn't have found them and definitely wouldn't have felt confident ordering them from an online merchant I wasn't familiar with.

PS these slippers are perfect for lounging around the house, keeping by the front door to have guests slip into if they want to remove their street shoes, and are exactly when you need on long flights and for your hotel room.

reviewText: wear it all the time....expands well to fit

This belt is perfect for anyone who's waistline increases or decreases often.  I purchased this belt for my younger brother who has a weight problem. Normal belts wouldn't cut it, as he has gone up in pants size several times and may go up again soon. Having a cheap and simple belt that can stretch to accommodate his girth, while matching his shorts, is just what was needed.

The belt is made in Taiwan, and is made from durable polyester blend that looks very similar to a paracord belt. There are no holes to buckle into like there are on a conventional belt. Instead you stick the prong in between any two pieces of rope wherever you need it and then buckle it like a normal belt. Unstretched the 2xl belt is about 53in from buckle to tip. Maximum stretching brings the length to 93in give or take. However, I wouldn't recommend wearing it at this length, as the risk of breaking a belt loop or the belt itself is high. The tip and buckle are made from cheap leather and the prong is cheap metal. But for the price, I can't complain.

Anyone who needs an elastic belt for a low price look no further, you've found it.
summary: Change your pants size, keep your belt.

reviewText: It's a belt.

This belt solved my problem--I am a bigger woman with a waist much smaller than her hips...on pants with an elastic waist I always run a drawstring so that I am not constantly hiking them up every time I stand up.  I recently got a wonderful buy on 5 pocket jeans in a size too big.  I tried the string around the waist trick but it didn't work because the jeans have belt loops and there was no "pocket" to run the drawstring through like there is on elastic waist pants.  This belt is wide enough to do the job securely but not too wide for the belt loops.  It is randomly adjustable so that on days when you need a little room you don't just have to open the button on your pants--you can just let the belt out!
Exactly as described. Very pleased.

Apart from that,  I love it! It's so colorful and well made :)

For the material and price, this is a great corset! This is not a tight corset by any means, as it doesn't have lacing obviously, but it adorable as a costume corset. I think a lot of the people buying this and reviewing the sizing chart badly simply are ignorant of corset sizing. FYI, your corset size is two to three inches smaller than your waist measurement. My waist measurement is 26", therefore, I buy size 24 corsets. I bought a size small in this corset since the size chart said a size small fits waist 24-25". It fit exactly as it was described to fit - I latched it on the tightest hook set, there are two options. The sequins are actually very cute, not at all gaudy or trashy looking like I feared. The colors are vibrant and beautiful! My measurements are 33-26-35. I am shallow-breasted and wear a size 32C. I had to wear this corset with a push up bra because my boobs were too small lol! But it fit perfectly around my hip bones. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to anyone.

I purchased 4 of these mugs and all 4 were unique in appearance due to all horns being slightly different, which I found to be neat. The reason I give 1 star? I filled the first mug with water to rinse it out and immediately noticed that it didn't hold water. It began to leak in several places namely where the bottom piece is attached to the horn. It also leaked through several small areas on the horn. To my disappointment I found that all four mugs leaked. So they are NOT usable. To make matters worse, once the mugs are wet they begin to smell...really bad. The smell was reminiscent of manure. Not something I want tainting my beverages. These are nice to show off on the mantle but that's about it.

reviewText:
Some tankini tops really ride up and get flimsy when swimming. I was looking for a bottom that wouldn't expose my entire stomach when that happens, so bought these. I have mixed feelings, but the product itself is good, so that's why I rated mostly positively.

Pros: They are slimming bottoms, so they really keep everything sucked and tucked and give smooth lines. Obviously because they're longer, they keep your tummy covered as promised, so this is good too. When I wear my tankini, it is flattering in terms of how everything looks together without any lumps and bumps.

Cons: I understand why it has to be this way, but the bottoms are SO long, they literally ride up like almost to right underneath my breasts. It fits in the bottom area fine, but I have to pull it up SO far underneath in order to have pulled up all the fabric. I think I must have a short torso, and this may not be as big of an issue for someone with a longer mid-section. In the picture here, the bottom doesn't ride up THAT much. But on me, it goes up way higher than that. This is a bit uncomfortable.

 It can start to try to roll down a bit and then you have to pull it back up every now and again. But you have to grab it from an awkward spot because of how high up I have to pull it. It's hard to do while you have the top on. At same time, because I have a short torso, if it was much shorter, it would squeeze me right at my waist and would eliminate the smooth lines I have when wearing this suit, rendering it useless. So I deal with these issues and maybe I can see if I can have a seamstress remove a bit of the fabric on the top and sew the waist band back on (don't know if that's possible with bathing suit material).
summary: Smoothing, Covers Tummy. Not Ideal for Short Torsos.

My Stats:
Male
32x34 pants
6'0
165 lbs slightly athletic build.

Harem Pants Fit:
came down to the top of my shins.
fit my waist comfortably.

Pros:
Light, Breathable, comfortable
I ordered it on July 25, they shipped July 26 and arrived July 27, and it wasn't even AmazonPrime!

Cons:
1)Since I'm pretty sure these pants are for women, be aware that there is an extended elastic band that covers half of your torso as well. You can't see it in the picture, because the model is either wearing a shirt over it, or it's cropped out. However, it doesn't get in the way at all. My shirt completely covered it up. I just put it as a con, just in case someone isn't expecting it.

2)The tiger print is more like an applique. Like something you would iron onto it. It's not the same material as the pants. I haven't tried putting them in a dryer yet, but if I did, i'm absolutely positive the tiger pattern would completely crumble apart. So, be sure to air dry them! That's the only reason I give it four stars.

Conclusion:
I still love the pants! I think they're great. They fit really well. They look really cool. And they're baggy enough to walk up stairs haha. I recommend them!

Getting into harem pants, may be my new style! I adore tigers, so I picked these as my first purchase. Harem pants look so baggy and comfy, and have such a cute style. I just got them in the mail minutes ago, tried them on, and fell in love. They are just as comfy as they look, and so stylish! I love my clothing to be flowy and non-constricting (no tight jeans for this girl) and these are just PERFECT! The fabric is so soft and airy, but not see-through. I'm a little worried about the tiger print and shrinking, so will wash these inside out in cold water, and hang to dry. I'm 5'3, and thought myself to be a little shorter than the models and so thought the pants would reach down to my ankles; however, they reach down a couple/few inches from my ankles, but are not capri length. I wish they did reach all the way down, but just as in the photo, they do not. It's alright, though, I still love them! Anyone taller than that, be aware of that fact. These have a very stretchy waistband, so no worries for fit. The waist band is about 7 inches high, so I can wear them a little low to cover more leg.
I am very pleased with these pants, they seem to be very well made, and the tiger print is just lovely. I can't wait to try their other cute harem pants!
summary: First try with harem pants, love em!

I usually workout during the day at work, and use the locker room to shower and change.  I keep these flip flops in my gym locker as they are perfect for the locker room shower.  Sometimes I inevitably end up in a shower that doesn't drain well.  I'm paranoid about getting some type of foot fungus in the shower so I'll usually turn start and wait for the water to drain when I notice that it's starting to rise past the height of my regular flip flops (you know the cheap ones you get at the drugstore).  These flip flops eliminate that problem.  They are high enough that I don't have to worry about a slow draining shower.

I am not one to leave negative feedback and I tend to look for the good in every situation. My original feedback for this seller was five stars but, sadly, things have changed. I purchased these flip flops because they were cute, chunky, reasonably priced and exactly what I was looking for. I wore them a handful of times over a period of two weeks. The fourth or fifth time I wore them, however, the straps lifted completely off the base of both flip flops, as did the black material that your foot rests on as you walk, and completely broke both flip flops. They were new and had been worn less than half a dozen times. I don't blame the seller as the seller didn't make the shoe, but the seller did sell me a product that, I feel, wasn't of a good quality.
summary: I was so excited about getting these sandals but...

reviewText: I've never done a review before on Amazon, but this last transaction changed that. When I first saw these clothes from Allegra K, I was so excited. I felt that they perfectly fit my style, and I seriously couldn't believe how cheap they were (Of course, that should have been a tip-off, but I have gotten so many things for cheap on Amazon, I was just wishing this lucky streak would continue). I searched for reviews on this line, or even this seller (regarding the clothes), but found nothing. At the last minute, I splurged and placed my order. I got the package super quickly, but none of the ten things I bought were wearable. Even though the material looks like classy chiffon/silk in the pictures, it is basically fabric that costumes are made out of. On top of the cheap fabric, the construction was terrible: seams were coming undone and stitching was crooked. Many of the tops had collars that were off-center and/or way too large (like a pilgrim costume). Two of the items had stains (one looked like spilled black ink, while the other looked like yellow-white paste). I was so sad after trying on all the items, thinking at least one would work out. I'm leaving this review on the all the pieces I bought so others thinking of purchasing these seemingly cute garments are sparred the disappointment. I emailed back and forth with the seller and they granted me a full refund. The sellers seem understanding, but the pictures are deceiving and the clothes are unwearable.
I'm 5'2" and this dress doesn't even go past my but cheeks. It's cute as a shirt, I suppose. I'm going to consign it.

reviewText: I love this t-shirt design and as someone who rides regularly, I am always excited to find a cycling-related t-shirt to wear during time off the saddle. This t-shirt is 100% cotton as indicated in the description, but there is no give to it (absolutely no lycra or material that has stretch to it). It's a mid-weight cotton feel (not too thin, not too thick). Since there isn't a garment-specific size chart, I can say that this runs on the small side, so I'd say size up from your usual size. It runs tight in the arms on me (but I am a kickboxer as well and have a lot of muscle, so that may be the issue for me specifically), and the neck is much more of a scoop than a crew neck than the picture would indicate. I would return this, but it comes from Germany and would cost more to return than the t-shirt costs originally, so I'll just keep it. Shipping was really quite fast considering it came from out of the U.S. (I ordered on the 13th of the month and it arrived on the 22nd, which was about 2 weeks sooner than Amazon's tracking indicated).
summary: Love the design, fit is small

There is nothing worse than pulling a tight WET swim top over the large head of a child.
This wonderful design eliminates that issue!  I promise I am just a regular mom, and I have
no association with this company.  I am just really happy to have two sets of swim wear by SwimZip for my son.
These are made of the softest material I have ever felt for a swimsuit!
Who knew polyester could feel so amazing?

We haven't used them in the water yet, because it is January here in Colorado.
But hopefully I can add an update to this review after we test them out in
the water in Hawaii.

The shorts have a drawstring,  THANK GOODNESS!!  I have had the toughest time finding swim shorts
with drawstrings, or that fit. And my son has the tiniest waist ever, for his height
So they fit really well.

The shirt is great because he can wear it all day on our vacation, even to restaurants
and things, because the collar makes it look like a regular shirt.

My son is very fair and I am SO grateful for the UV protection.  Even if your child
doesn't get sunburned, they can still get skin cancer that shows up later in their lives.
So this really is wonderful.  Even "waterproof" sunscreens wear off in the water quickly.

I am very happy with this purchase, and if it works like it says it does,
it is worth every penny.
Also I received this VERY quickly, which is great!

She initially tried to tug them off (as she does with all shoes, they seem to annoy her).  Then she walked a few steps and heard the squeak.  There was a huge smile.  Then she tried to see if bouncing would work (no) so she started walking back and forth between her big sister and I giggling and smiling.  When I started to take the shoes off she was annoyed.  She wanted them back on!  She loves these so much!  So, hooray for strange, but good, ideas.

My girl is a princess, unfortunately she knows it.  She's picky and it's a pain trying to get shoes on her kicking legs!  Between the cute panda face and the squeaky soles she can't wait to get her shoes on! The squeaks are fun and when they get old I found you can easily remove and replace the squeaker.  I've been more than happy with the shoes. For the low price you get a well constructed shoe.  I imagine them lasting a long time.  I would recommend Yochi Yochis for anyone looking for fun shoes at a low price.

reviewText:
I was looking for an all or mostly cotton nursing bra for a while. Unfortunately, for my first 4 month pp, I used bravado only and they were fully synthetic. When I saw this product, I was quite excited. The only non- cotton areas are in between cups and near back closure, so it places where it does not matter if your skin can breath.

Overall, the fit is great- I ordered my pre- pregnancy cup size because now 4 month later, my milk supply is stable and I no longer get too bulky.

I gave this product 4 out 5 however, because there was a tiny hole- fortunately in the second layer that gets covered up by front cup layer. Also, the stretching around bra and on bra holders look ancient- almost as if it is from 60's wonderbra ad.
summary: Comfortable and as a bonus, it is cotton!

reviewText:
After ordering from this seller twice I felt compelled to review the product to help you future cosplayers so you know what you're getting. First off, the picture is a little misleading. I will include pictures of my own for you to see. You pretty much get everything but its not in the way the picture shows.

White Shirt - Normal Dress Shirt
Vest - Material Made; Embroidered. Very Well Done. (comes in white or light gray - seller does not specify which you get)
Coat with Hood - Material Made; Embroidered. Very Well Done. (comes in white or light gray - seller does not specify which you get)
Black Pants - Capri Pants with Stretchy Waist. Button Up.
Cloak - Material Made with Embroidery. Connects with Belt.
Gauntlet - Soft Plastic with Buckles for Adjusting
Gauntlet - Plain Soft Plastic with Velcro for Adjusting
Belt - Costume Black Belt
White Glove - Material Costume Glove
Black Glove - Material Costume Glove
Boot Covers - Soft Plastic with Buckles for Adjusting
Red Sash w/Belt - Material Made Sash with Sewn in Plastic Assassin's Logo for a Buckle; Fake Belt and two pouches. Velcro Adjusting (different versions of this exist - seller does not specify which you get)
Red Ribbon - Just a plain Red Ribbon

I ordered two of these. The first time I ordered a Medium and got the Vest and Hooded coat in white. When I ordered the same thing in large, the vest and hooded coat are a light gray. Its not a big deal to me but buyer beware. Also, the sash appears to have different styles. One version I received did not have the brown belt while one did. There is no metal buckle as the picture suggests; most of the metal you see in the picture is plastic or sewn in. For those that are wondering, I ordered them because I did like the material hood, vest, and cloak (and this was the cheapest I could find at the time to get all three). I made my own modifications after I received the items to better suit my cosplay. The pictures I'm providing is exactly what came with what I ordered. I hope this and the picture helps you guys out.

In case the pictures don't show, you can find them here (the only post on the site is the pictures so you don't have to search for them): [...]
summary: Not Exactly As The Picture Suggests

The only disappointment is that the lining is not attached to the bottom or sides so it slides around making putting things in and taking them out difficult at times.  Other wise I love this bag!  If it's not real leather it sure looks and feels like real leather!  It is heavy.  I was shocked at how heavy it was when it was empty out of the box.  It has lots of room and that's why I bought it.  I use it for my clinical for my master's program and don't have to bring more than one bag with it.  Most of what I need to take with me fits in there along with my other items.  One suggestion if you buy this bag is to use some sort of organizer with it.  It has pockets but I find it much easier to find things by using small pouch bags inside the purse.  I have one bag for things like pills, another for pens, work badges, and other small items, doing this keeps me from searching through the bag for small things.  It's a huge bag inside but doesn't look enormous when you're carrying it, but you can "lose" small items in it because of the slippery lining.  Have had lots of compliments on this bag.  My daughter wants it!  She can't have it!

Also, they are double lined and subsequently lose some definition that way. I believe that men's swimwear should distinctly outline the genitals. These don't do that. They are modest, which may be desirable. I am thrilled with the quality of construction, price, and shipping speed! I received them in 16 days! Overall, I am pleased.

I had my new purse a little over a week, before I become very disappointed with it. Walking out of work, after a long day, the purse just fell to the ground as I was walking through the parking lot -- In the rain. The long strap - one of my most favorite features of the purse - had ripped at the stitching on one side! Imagine my embarrassment and frustration as I scooped up my belongings from the ground, as quickly as I could, to escape the stares and the start of a down pour.
I really like this purse, still - but the durability is  poor. And I think future buyers should know this.
Other than that, not much else to complain about. I thought I had found the perfect purse for me foe a decent price, until my favorite part was, literally, ripped from me.

Before I start my review I would like to thank TheLees for having DHL deliver their packages. It's my first experience with them, and they have proven themselves to be fast and convenient. Anyways lets get started with the review.

First Impressions:
When I first saw this coat I was thinking that it was sort of like a suit jacket, but it's really more like a jacket and a suit combined (I've never really owned a PEA coat so I wouldn't know).

Specifications:
The jacket do feature interior/exterior pockets; however the chest pocket is fake, but the stitching can be undone (I don't know why you would do that, but whatever floats your boat).

Overall:
The coat is really well made and I can't wait to show it off. If you are living in a cold environment or hey, even for fashion, I recommend buying this. You will love it!!!

I read the reviews for this prior to purchasing. I also sent e-mails to the seller quite often to figure out the size I should be getting. I did as much research as I possibly could.

First, I'd like to mention the pockets. The two lower outside pockets are fully functional. They were not sewn shut for me. There is also an inside pocket that is fully functional as well. The upper outer pocket is sewn shut for me. I don't know if it means it's just for aesthetics or not. It doesn't seem to be lightly sewn shut, so I don't know if it's like what the other reviewers mentioned about it being common practice or not, but you do have the two pockets at least.

When I tried it on, it felt quite comfortable. The warmth felt like a jacket I would wear in NYC weather. But then again, I've been living in NYC for my whole life, so maybe I'm use to it. Plus I wear layers. It definitely isn't a freezing NYC weather jacket. If it were one of those 19 degree weather with -10 degree windchills, I'd wear something else. If it were in the mid-30s, I'd wear this. It's about the same thickness as my other jackets, but keep in mind that I typically wear layers underneath and I'm used to cold weather.

The only difficulty I had was the size. I would have gone with the US Small (The US Small were fitted for my sleeves, height, and chest.), but according to the measurements, the shoulders would have been too tight for my comfort (My shoulders are 45cm.). My shoulders were a perfect fit for the US Medium. I was taking into consideration that I'd be wearing layers, and Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's would be around when I'm wearing this jacket. I wanted to account that I would be gaining some extra fat. So, after much discussion with the seller, I decided to order the US Medium. They were very thorough with answering my question. I was basically at a choice of the jacket being pretty snug on the shoulders and a fitted everywhere else or the jacket being comfortable on the shoulders and a little loose everywhere else. I decided to go with the comfort on the shoulders and a little loose everywhere else and to just tailor everywhere else if I needed to. I was anticipating that I would have to tailor it to be a better fit. It turned out that it was a little more than a little loose. But that wasn't a problem because I was anticipating it anyways. At least my shoulders are just perfect. All I need to do is fix the waist and a little bit of the chest.

All in all, I'm happy with my purchase. If only there was a perfect size for me, I'd give it 5-stars. The whole shipment and delivery process was very fast. It took a week at most. I still need to figure out about that top pocket though, but I'm too scared to tear it open...not that I'd ever really use it.

Updated for 12/7/2013
So, I've worn this jacket in temperatures of low 40s (With minimal wind) with just a dress shirt and an undershirt underneath. The jacket is still keeping me warm. I got the jacket tailored to fit my waist and chest. The upper pocket looking thing is confirmed not to be a pocket along with the flap that is above one of the bottom pockets. But who cares? You still have to exterior pockets at the bottom, and an interior pocket.

THIS IS THE REVIEW YOU NEED TO READ BEFORE YOU ORDER ANY OF THIS COMPANY'S DRESSES

1. The dress listing is for multiple dresses, some of them work for the size chart, some do not. I ordered the Red dress. I ordered a size larger than I normally wear and measured very liberally to be safe. I wear a 10, ordered a 14, dress that arrived was roughly a 6/8.
I had to return it, and have them send me a size 18

2. When you do a return, you will have to be persistent about the tracking. They told me my return had not arrived even 2 days after it had, they refused to send the new dress "until" it arrived, and withheld it 3 days in total.

3. They will make you pay the return shipping for a too-small item, then charge you the $24.99 shipping to send the new item, and they send it standard shipping, which should be less than $10.00

4. Customer service is located in China, the only contact with them is via email, their English is poor and they make multiple excuses for delays. You will also only be able to email back and forth with them in the middle of the night if you are in the US.

5. The dress is high quality, beautiful fabric, well made, looks stunning on, really was exactly what I wanted.

6. The underskirt/fitted part of the dress does not extend to the thighs, the slit comes ALL the way up, and the skirting is completely sheer. As in, my hooha and rear were literally hanging out of the bottom of the dress and VERY visible through the sheer fabric. I had to add fabric to the interior of the dress, so only buy this if you have time to get it altered.

7. The dress trails behind you, looks lovely, you won't be able to wear it with sequin-y heels as they will catch on the very delicate fabric, and you'll need to carry the end of the dress if you walk outside at all.

8. Crystals on the bust in the sheer fabric are a lovely addition, it comes with detachable spaghetti straps, and if you're busty, you'll need those.

In summary:

It is a beautiful, sexy, fantastic dress, my hubby's jaw damn near hit the floor; BUT - Only order from them if you have the time, money and patience to wait for to arrive, try it on, have it not fit, do an exchange, and have the new dress they send to you a week or so later altered, before whatever event you're buying it for.
summary: THIS IS THE REVIEW YOU ******NEED TO READ****** BEFORE ORDERING ANY OF THIS COMPANY'S DRESSES

I was given one of these as a birthday gift and it is a nice looking casual watch. However after a period of time the chrono (minute hands) would not reset to zero. I called Wenger to see how to "recalibrate" the watch but it would not recalibrate.  I returned the watch and exchanged it for the same model.  ONE DAY after exchanging it,  the minute hand on the NEW watch would not return to zero. Same thing- would not recalibrate.

These watches are now sold at Costco for around $100, so I can only imagine that Wenger had to cheapen the production to make it available at a price where it would RETAIL at that price.  I love the look of the watch, but if it doesn't function properly it's not worth it at any price.

As opposed to the previous review, I find I have to wind it twice a day to keep on time -- about ten full winds in the morning and the same at night; otherwise, it loses a couple of minutes each day.  And I don't have a problem with the band -- I prefer non-leather.  The only issue is that it came with two perpendicular straps to keep the tail in place (see photos) and one of those broke for me during the first week or two.
Lastly, the glow-in-the-dark spots on the watch are very dim and don't really work well at night.

Besides all that, though, I really like the watch.  It's hard to find manual-wind watches in general these days without spending $1000, and this one looks nice to me, works consistently, and feels comfortable.  What more could you ask for at less than $20?

Here's the breakdown:

Pros:
Quite (I can barely hear it tick even when I put my ear to it)
Accurate (It keeps time very well and since it's an automatic watch I only have to wind it once in the morning and I'm set all day)
Stylish (I have gotten a lot of compliments on its "retro" look)
Easy to read (The blue against the beige and large numbers make this watch extremely easy to read)

Cons:
The strap is not leather, it's a really difficult to work with plastic (I'm getting a new band).
The hands, though they look like they would glow in the dark, do not.

Once I get a replacement strap this watch could bump up to a 4.5!
summary: Good Automatic Watch For The Price

reviewText:
Haha! It's actually quite funny how well this works. I'm not a professional on these things but $6.99 was worth a shot. I did the extension on myself and it worked great, had fabulous eyelashes for a couple of weeks before I started picking on them and then went crazy and felt the need to take them off. (not that they were in the way or anything, I'm just anal like that sometimes) I wish they could include a glue remover however, I went to buy one and it didn't work well and now after 6 weeks (ish) I still have some glue on my lashes (I can feel it but you cant see it) so the glue is pretty strong.

Don't get the glue in your eye, I did. It was stuck on my cornea for a whole day before my eyes worked it off during a night off sleep with a continuous running eye and burning pain. So Yeaah... other than that, eyelashes can be fabulous for 7 bucks!

I was very pleased with the lashes & the glue...the tweezers leave a little to be desired but if just practicing--they are wonderful--I bought a pair of strip lashes and train at home by adhering the extensions onto them. If the seller is reading this, I would like to see an adhesive remover, a jade stone and maybe even a "practice" set of strip lashes added to the kit. That would really make it complete.

reviewText:
I travel a lot internationally. I was looking for a waterproof set after seeing my bags being loaded in the middle of a storm, and my clothes inside being wet for days.
PROS - super light (for some reason I thought the "plastic" shell would be heavier than my traditional fabric luggage, this was not the case), super easy to roll (almost no effort at all required), I would consider this waterproof although it is not advertised as such (sure there is a possibility that water can get through the middle where the zipper is, but only a very small part of the bag's contents would be effected), TSA lock makes it very convenient not having to worry about losing your traditional one.  I LOVE the color/design and it makes it very easy to spot coming off the belt. I get people walking up to me in the airport all the time asking where I bought it.
CONS - there are no front pockets to throw in last minute things (I always put my travel scale in there and now there is no pocket for it). Additionally, there are no spaces/pockets for a name tag. I place one on the handle and hope it isn't pulled off in transit.

So far I have used this set  on 14 international flights and it is holding up very well. 4 stars because of the few "cons" I mentioned, but overall a great product.
I like this nose piercing.... good material, good stone and colorful, adjustable size!! I really recommend it. :) And the price it is so good!!

This pendant is built very well and I have no doubt that is will last for years before anything on it breaks.
The chain is actually heavier than the pendant itself and is incredibly sturdy. In spite of the weight imbalance, the Hammer stays in place and the chain will not try to slide down. I have worn mine every day since its arrival and I have had no issues what so ever.

Overall this is incredibly well made and I would recommend it as it is worth every penny.
summary: The chain is actually heavier than the pendant itself and is incredibly sturdy. In spite of the weight imbalance

reviewText:
I have other 'Ever Pretty' dresses and I like the quality for the price; we go on a cruise every year and I enjoy dressing up for formal night. But this one---not so much; the flowers kind of look like they were made with 'puffy paint' and the padded bust area was oversized while the hips fit nicely (I have ordered the same size in their other dresses and bust was well fitted.) The bottom is designed VERY nice---the movement when you walk is fluid. It's hard to describe, but each step causes a perfect ripple.

Pros: Blue and White color is striking, skirt design is beautiful
Cons: large bust area, blue design looks a little cheesy on close inspection
summary: Some positive aspects---but it wasn't for me.

I love not lugging my handbag to run into a market or when I am shopping with friends.  I had a lovely leather wallet on a strap that my lab chewed and destroyed and I have been searching for a replacement.  It is not easy to find, especially of leather.  My girlfriend pointed this one out to me.  It is very functional and easy to use as a cross body but it cannot be overloaded with credit cards.  Since it kept popping open (a disaster) I took out all my service cards i.e. Sam's club, library, pharmacy discount etc. and put them in a small card holder in my purse.  I only keep vital cards in this wallet such as ATM or credit cards I use often.  Now it works perfectly without popping open.  There is enough room for money, and several credit cards.  I love the back of it as it has two zippered compartments one for change and one for a cell phone and a lipstick.  It is fabric which means it doesn't "give" as well as leather but that is minor.  It is a much safer option than leaving your big bag in a shopping cart.  The print fabric on the inside isn't my style but it did not dissuade me from buying it.  Sometimes Vera has some wild prints....this is a zigzag design.

This is my 1st new wallet in more than 5 years. I love anything vera. I compared all the wallets that were available and this one seemed to fit my needs the best. I only gave it 4 stars because I still love my old vera better but I think once I get use to this one I will love it as well.
Love this wallet. Classy and holds everything I need. Love it! My favorite cross body.the length is good.i I recommend this wallet! You will love it!

Came on time. Fits all my cards, checkbook, cash, and discount cards perfectly! It even fits my iPhone and I can carry it as a clutch with the strap. The black color looks sharp and classy too. I wish the inside print was prettier (orange-y almost-zigzag??) but that seems to be a vera trademark move.
Anyway- I recommend.

just got these and they do not seem to get as dark as I expected.  these will be good for riding toward evening into night, but will definitely keep my dark glasses handy otherwise.

I was looking to replace the Kickback sunglasses I lost and came across these.  It's a pain when you're riding at dusk with sunglasses on and there is no convenient place to pull over, so I thought these would be perfect.  Unfortunately, they don't get dark enough.  At their darkest, the lenses have what I would call a fashion tint.  They're OK except for really bright sunshine and glare.  Unfortunately, that's exactly what I need sunglasses for.  Love the frames, not crazy about the lenses.

I think Kickbacks are the best sunglasses deal on the Internet.  They are rugged, the lenses don't scratch easily, are comfortable worn with a helmet (a rare quality in motorcycle glasses), and they fit my thin nose bridge.  These would be great on an overcast day or at dusk when you're not riding into the sun.  I'm going to make them my night glasses.

12/7/13 Update:
I actually use these glasses a lot.  They don't replace my sunglasses, but on overcast days, at dusk, or at night, they are great.  Better than clear lenses.

It fit as expected. It was missing a stone and we found that they came off easily, but was just as easy to glue back on. The dress came very wrinkled but we pressed it with a regular household  iron with no problem. I gave this dress 4 stars comparing it to others in the same price range.  It made it to us lightning quick and looked beautiful for prom.  The fabric is not luxurious but had a nice drape and the color was stunning.
summary: Quickly shipped and a great value!

After doing a lot of research as to whether I should buy my first prom dress online, I'm soo glad I chose this one! They don't give any info on how long the dress will be, but I think you can look for that in the actual edressit website. (in which if you ordered this dress custom-made through them, it would be ~$250) I had to get this hemmed, and the tailors said it was "lopsided/uneven" but I didn't see it (I went to two tailors to compare prices.. one of them charged more for it being that way). The dress looks fairly thin on picture, but it has two layers of silk, making the bottom pretty thick. The color is beautiful. Came in a really small box so if you don't end up taking it to a tailor, pressing it would be on the to do list. It came in on time, quicker than expected. (About a week or two- though the checkout said in two months.) None of the pictures showed how deep cut the back is, and I never really paid attention to how low it is as well. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

I order this beautiful dress for my husband's Marine Corps Birthday Ball. I have to say it is absolutely stunning, beautiful, and elegant. It is light weight and the length on it was perfect. I order this dress on a Friday and I received it that following Wednesday, so I was very impressed with the turn around of getting this item shipped to me. The vendor was also very helpful in informing me when they received my order and verified I order the correct size and when it shipped out. The sizing chart is accurate, so i recommend you get your correct sizes because they do run different and smaller than sizes here in the United States.
I can't wait to wear this dress and show it off at the ball. I would recommend this vendor to my family and friends and I look forward to buying again from them in the future. For I have many more balls to attend. :)

reviewText: The waist region is made for women with really long torsos, but otherwise it's just fine.

I used these to put Calcium Chloride ice melt on my roof last winter to cut trenches in thick ice dams: 96% CALCIUM CHLORIDE Snow & Ice Melt Pellets / Dust control - 5 Gallon Each leg can easily hold 4 or more cups of ice melt (in a tube shape about two feet long) without any escaping through the material. They can hold far more if stretched, but they start getting unwieldy. The main problem was the nylon material would freeze to the shingle roof, causing holes to be torn in the legs when taking them down to refill them.
I have been wearing these pantyhose for 25 years.  They are very forgiving of snags and last a long time.  Good fit for my lifestyle!
Fit as expected, as with normal pantyhose, be careful or else you will get runs. They are thin but look nice.  Don't expect to wear these in the middle of winter and not get chilly!

As soon as you put these hose on you will find little breaks in the material.  However it's interesting that they don't all form runs (although one run is all it takes).  They are super hard to manipulate once on the body.  One would think that over the years Legg's would figure out how to make a decent pair of panty hose.
They are perfect for everyday wear (as they say).  You can get several wears out of one pair so they are worth the money.
summary: Good quality for every day wear
